game.name: Dig To Escape
game.shortDescription: Dig to Escape is a VR prison-break adventure where you dig tunnels, complete risky inmate quests, fight rivals, avoid guards, and upgrade your tools to plan the perfect escape. Every run challenges you to adapt, improvise, and outsmart the prison from the inside.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dig to Escape is a VR prison-break adventure where you dig tunnels, complete risky inmate quests, fight rivals, avoid guards, and upgrade your tools to plan the perfect escape. Every run challenges you to adapt, improvise, and outsmart the prison from the inside.
